mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(CE.regDate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS 'start' , E.name AS 'className' FROM oneul.CalendarEmotion CE INNER JOIN oneul.Emotion E ON CE.emotionId = E.id WHERE CE.memberId = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: insert into CalendarEmotion(regDate, memberId, emotionId) value(#{regDate}, #{memberId}, #{emotionId})
mapper.delete: delete from CalendarEmotion where memberId=#{memberId} and regDate = #{regDate}
